title: You should have the option to fill with one role excluded.
body: Pretty simple, I just don't want to play top, which I have a decent chance of doing when I lock supp. Playing 'fill' is super broad, which some people like, but I feel like a lot of fill players would like to not play one role, and a lot of players that are currently choosing two roles would choose fill and exclude if they had the chance..

replies.body:
They tried this already. When the role section system first came out people asked for it. Basically 90% of people excluded Support which then led to an increase in queue times by like 700% or some bs. So Riot scrapped it and instead said they would focus on "making support fun".

https://www.riftherald.com/culture/2016/9/30/13125180/lol-role-selection-position-preference

Honestly, I just feel like adding an "avoid" (or, rather, "non-preferred") option alongside the two preferred options would go a long way to creating a better experience for everyone. It would allow players to avoid one position that they're particularly bad at (jungle for me, I will do anything but jungle), and give the matchmaking algorithms more info to work with when trying to match teams. It *may* have a negative impact on queue times, particularly in "low population" scenarios, but that's no reason not to give it a trial at least. After all, it may just work.
